tha-ap464:0.3_0: As a result, he was glowd and raped by senior monks.
tha-ap464:1.2_0: the world is attached to the world,
tha-ap464:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap464:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap464:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap464:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
tha-ap464:7.1_0: who had been swept away by the senior monks, who were a companion.
